title: The Death of Ish-Bosheth
summary: Two of Ish-Boshethâ€™s men betray and murder him while he sleeps. They bring his head to David, expecting a reward. Instead, David has them executed for killing an innocent man.

faq.question: How did Ish-Bosheth die?
faq.answer: He was assassinated by two of his own men while resting at home.

faq.question: How did David respond to the assassination?
faq.answer: He had the murderers executed, showing his commitment to justice.
